me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar

Class BossBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.util.bossbar.BossBar
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BossBarBase

    public abstract class BossBar
extends java.lang.Object
    A BossBar is a bar that is displayed at the top of the screen.

      • createBossBar

        public static BossBar createBossBar(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                    java.lang.String title,
                                    double progress,
                                    BarColor color,
                                    BarStyle style,
                                    BarFlag... flags)
        Creates a boss bar instance to display to players.

        Parameters:
        player - Player viewer
        title - Title of the boss bar
        progress - Progress of the boss bar
        color - Color of the boss bar
        style - Style of the boss bar
        flags - Optional list of flags to set on the boss bar
        Returns:
        Created boss bar

      • createBossBar

        public static BossBar createBossBar(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                    java.lang.String title,
                                    BarColor color,
                                    BarStyle style,
                                    BarFlag... flags)
        Creates a boss bar instance to display to players. The progress defaults to 1.0.

        Parameters:
        player - Player viewer
        title - Title of the boss bar
        color - Color of the boss bar
        style - Style of the boss bar
        flags - Optional list of flags to set on the boss bar
        Returns:
        Created boss bar

      • createBossBar

        public static BossBar createBossBar(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                    java.lang.String title,
                                    double progress)
        Creates a boss bar instance to display to players. The color defaults to BarColor.PINK. The style defaults to BarStyle.SOLID.

        Parameters:
        player - Player viewer
        title - Title of the boss bar
        progress - Progress of the boss bar
        Returns:
        Created boss bar

      • createBossBar

        public static BossBar createBossBar(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                    java.lang.String title)
        Creates a boss bar instance to display to players. The color defaults to BarColor.PINK. The style defaults to BarStyle.SOLID. The progress defaults to 1.0.

        Parameters:
        player - Player viewer
        title - Title of the boss bar
        Returns:
        Created boss bar

      • getProgress

        public abstract double getProgress()
        Returns the progress of the bar between 0.0 and 1.0

        Returns:
        Progress of the bar

      • setProgress

        public abstract void setProgress(double progress)
        Sets the progress of the bar. Values should be between 0.0 (empty) and 1.0 (full)

        Parameters:
        progress - Progress of the bar

      • getPlayer

        public abstract org.bukkit.entity.Player getPlayer()

      • setVisible

        public abstract void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Set if the boss bar is displayed to attached player.

        Parameters:
        visible - Visible status

      • isVisible

        public abstract boolean isVisible()
        Return if the boss bar is displayed to attached player.

        Returns:
        Visible status

      • show

        public void show()
        Shows the previously hidden boss bar to all attached player

        This is the equivalent of calling setVisible(boolean) providing false.

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Hides this boss bar from all attached player

        This is the equivalent of calling setVisible(boolean) providing true.
